name: mega-charm
effect: Unused. This appears as the girlplayer’s Mega Bracelet in Pokémon Contests, but it cannot actually be obtained.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This charm contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying Mega Stones to Mega Evolve in battle.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This charm contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying Mega Stones to Mega Evolve in battle.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This charm contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying Mega Stones to Mega Evolve in battle.
